DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate different dos Influenza A/H1N1 pandemic vaccine . Primary Objectives : - To describe immunogenicity candidate vaccine injection . - To describe safety candidate vaccine injection .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Different Formulations A/H1N1 Pandemic Vaccine Healthy Adults Elderly
DOC.detailed_description: Participants receive two injection randomized vaccine Day 0 Day 21 , respectively .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : Healthy adult age 18 year old day inclusion Informed consent sign date Able attend schedule visit comply trial procedure For woman childbearing potential , use effective method contraception abstinence least 4 week prior first vaccination , least 4 week last vaccination . Exclusion Criteria : Known pregnancy positive urine pregnancy test Currently breastfeed child Participation another clinical trial investigate vaccine , drug , medical device , medical procedure 4 week precede first trial vaccination Planned participation another clinical trial present trial period Receipt vaccine 4 week precede trial vaccination Planned receipt vaccine prior Day 42 blood sample Receipt blood bloodderived product past 3 month might interfere assessment immune response Known suspect congenital acquire immunodeficiency , immunosuppressive therapy anticancer chemotherapy radiation therapy within precede 6 month , longterm systemic corticosteroid therapy ( prednisone equivalent 2 consecutive week within past 3 month ) Selfreported seropositivity Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) , Hepatitis B antigen , Hepatitis C Known systemic hypersensitivity vaccine component , history lifethreatening reaction vaccine ( ) use trial vaccine contain substance Self report thrombocytopenia contraindicating intramuscular ( IM ) vaccination Bleeding disorder receipt anticoagulants 3 week precede inclusion contraindicate IM vaccination Deprived freedom administrative court order , emergency setting , hospitalize involuntarily Current alcohol abuse drug addiction may interfere subject 's ability comply trial procedure Chronic illness opinion Investigator , stage might interfere trial conduct completion Employees Investigator study center , direct involvement propose study study direction Investigator study center , well family member employee Investigator . Previous participation swineorigin H1N1 pandemic flu trial except performed 1976 Any confirm case influenza ( include swineorigin A/H1N1 Influenza ) since March 2009 Febrile illness ( temperature ≥ 100.4°F [ ≥ 38.0°C ] ) moderate severe acute illness/infection ( accord Investigator judgment ) day vaccination Personal family history GuillainBarré syndrome Active neoplastic disease history hematologic malignancy Known seizure/epilepsy history and/or take antiseizure medication Receipt psychiatric drug . Subjects receive single antidepressant drug stable least 3 month prior enrollment , without decompensating symptom allow enroll study
